value:
$WmMPID_ディアマンド,ch19_11_Diamand_M_Normal,Face|Whew, the foes of this world are no
slouches. But it's all right—we just
have to push through.$k$pSoon, we'll be able to regroup with
the Divine Dragon and the others.
How are you three holding up?$k$p$WmMPID_魔器スタルーク,ch19_14_Staluke_M_Weapon01,Face|I-I'm fine!$k$p$WmMPID_ラピス,ch19_15_Lapis_F_Normal,Face|Hanging in there.$k$p$WmMPID_シトリニカ,ch19_16_Citrinica_F_Normal,Face|I'm quite all right, thank you for
asking.$k$p$WmMPID_ディアマンド,ch19_11_Diamand_M_Normal,Face|Good. I'm proud of you all. You're
fighting like true Brodians!$k$p$WmMPID_魔器スタルーク,ch19_14_Staluke_M_Weapon01,Face|Not me. I've been totally unhelpful.
If anything, I'd say I'm holding us
back.$k$pMaybe I should be a decoy—get them
to aim their attacks at me. Then at
least you three can survive.$k$p$WmMPID_ラピス,ch19_15_Lapis_F_Normal,Face|Don't talk like that, Prince Alcryst!
If anyone's going to distract them,
it ought to be me and Citrinne.$k$p$WmMPID_シトリニカ,ch19_16_Citrinica_F_Normal,Face|I agree. Such duties should naturally
fall to your retainers.$k$p$WmMPID_魔器スタルーク,ch19_14_Staluke_M_Weapon01,Face|No, please! Your lives are worth far
more than my piddling existence!$k$p$WmMPID_シトリニカ,ch19_16_Citrinica_F_Normal,Face|*sigh* There's that trademark
modesty...$k$p$WmMPID_ラピス,ch19_15_Lapis_F_Normal,Face|We're not going to let you get hurt,
Prince Alcryst. Or you, for that
matter, Prince Diamant.$k$pSince your retainers aren't here,
Citrinne and I will make it our job to
keep you safe as well.$k$p$WmMPID_ディアマンド,ch19_11_Diamand_M_Normal,Face|Thank you. I know my brother and I
are in good hands.$k$p$WmMPID_魔器スタルーク,ch19_14_Staluke_M_Weapon01,Face|Diamant, look! Enemies behind us.
Not many, but they look formidable.$k$p$WmMPID_ディアマンド,ch19_11_Diamand_M_Normal,Face|Good spotting, Alcryst. Now, prepare
for battle!$k$p$WmMPID_ラピス,ch19_15_Lapis_F_Normal,Face|Let's lay them low!$k$p$WmMPID_シトリニカ,ch19_16_Citrinica_F_Normal,Face|With any luck, we'll be back at the
castle by dinnertime.$k$p
